sourcesContent:
import './about.css' function About() { return (
Hi, we are 3Cs Co-Founders
There are people who are not good with expressing their views in person but can have a great impact through their words in articles. Our website is a platform for people who want to share their views on an individual subject and also want to interact with others. User need to first register on our platform. The user can view other people’s blog and also can post his/her own. Here, the user need to unlock the blogs to read them. Visitors can comment and interact with you which helps you to create a network of loyal followers. Originality is ensured

Why us?

Check Plagiarism
This is to ensure that only original blogs are on the platform.

Credit System
Providing each user with certain credits at the time of registration(more need to be purchased if needed). These credits will be used to view the blog and the amount deducted from the viewer’s account will be added to the account of blog’s owner. These credits can be redeemed after fulfilling certain conditions. This will encourage the bloggers as the growing ones will also be able to earn money.

Connect with bloggers
This is a chat section that will allow the user to connect with the blog’s owner personally.
) } export default About;
